filmography.title: Pride of the Marines
filmography.role_description: The loyal fiancée of Al Schmid, a Marine blinded in combat, who fights to help him overcome his bitterness and depression.
filmography.plot: The true story of Al Schmid, a Marine blinded in combat who must overcome his bitterness and accept the love of those around him.

filmography.title: Of Human Bondage
filmography.role_description: A cruel, manipulative waitress who torments a club-footed medical student; a role famously played by Bette Davis in the 1934 version.
filmography.plot: A medical student becomes obsessively enamored with a low-class waitress who repeatedly rejects and abuses him.

filmography.title: Never Say Goodbye
filmography.role_description: A divorced woman whose ex-husband tries to win her back before she marries another man, aided by their young daughter.
filmography.plot: A divorced man tries to win back his ex-wife before she marries another man, using their daughter as an accomplice.

filmography.title: The Voice of the Turtle
filmography.role_description: A sweet, aspiring actress recovering from a failed romance who reluctantly lets a soldier on leave stay in her apartment.
filmography.plot: A soldier on leave in New York City finds lodging with an actress, leading to romance despite her reluctance.

filmography.title: The Woman in White
filmography.role_description: A dual role as a wealthy heiress and her mysterious, mentally unstable lookalike in this gothic mystery.
filmography.plot: A drawing teacher visiting a wealthy estate gets involved in a mystery concerning a woman in white and a plot to steal an inheritance.

filmography.title: Chain Lightning
filmography.role_description: A former flame of a reckless test pilot who works for an aviation company and tries to ground him.
filmography.plot: A reckless test pilot tries to sell a new high-speed jet to the Air Force while rekindling a romance with his old girlfriend.

filmography.title: Caged
filmography.role_description: A naive 19-year-old widow sent to prison for a minor accessory crime who is brutally hardened by the corrupt system.
filmography.plot: An innocent young woman is sent to prison, where she is transformed into a hardened convict by the brutal environment.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress; Venice Film Festival: Win – Volpi Cup

filmography.title: Three Secrets
filmography.role_description: One of three women who wait anxiously to see if a boy who survived a plane crash is the son she gave up for adoption.
filmography.plot: Three women wait to hear news of a plane crash survivor, each believing the boy involved is the son she gave up for adoption years ago.

filmography.title: Detective Story
filmography.role_description: The devoted wife of a rigid police detective whose past secret regarding an illegal abortion threatens to destroy their marriage.
filmography.plot: A bitter police detective tracks an abortionist while his own marriage crumbles due to his rigid morality.

filmography.title: Scaramouche
filmography.role_description: A fiery stage actress who loves the hero but complicates his quest for revenge with her jealousy.
filmography.plot: In 18th-century France, a young man hides out in a commedia dell'arte troupe to exact revenge on a nobleman who killed his friend.

filmography.title: Above and Beyond
filmography.role_description: The confused and suffering wife of Paul Tibbets, the pilot who dropped the atomic bomb on Hiroshima.
filmography.plot: The story of Paul Tibbets, the pilot of the Enola Gay, and the strain the top-secret mission placed on his marriage.

filmography.title: Escape from Fort Bravo
filmography.role_description: A Confederate sympathizer who infiltrates a Union fort to help prisoners escape, but falls for the commanding officer.
filmography.plot: During the Civil War, the commanding officer of a Union prison camp faces a mass escape and an Indian attack.

filmography.title: The Naked Jungle
filmography.role_description: A proxy bride from New Orleans who arrives at a South American plantation and must prove her worth to her stubborn husband.
filmography.plot: A South American plantation owner attempts to hold off a river of killer ants from destroying his land.

filmography.title: Valley of the Kings
filmography.role_description: A determined woman who hires an archaeologist to help her find a tomb in Egypt to prove the Bible's historical truth.
filmography.plot: An archaeologist and a determined woman search for a pharaoh's tomb in Egypt while being pursued by those who want the treasure.

filmography.title: Many Rivers to Cross
filmography.role_description: A sharp-shooting frontier woman who sets her sights on a trapper and forces him into marriage.
filmography.plot: A trapper trying to reach Canada to trade furs is pursued by a determined woman who wants to marry him.

filmography.title: Interrupted Melody
filmography.role_description: The real-life Australian opera star who is stricken with polio at the height of her career and fights to sing again.
filmography.plot: The true story of Australian opera singer Marjorie Lawrence, who struggles to return to the stage after being crippled by polio.

filmography.title: The Man with the Golden Arm
filmography.role_description: The manipulative, wheelchair-bound wife of a recovering heroin addict who feigns paralysis to keep him guilty and bound to her.
filmography.plot: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction and become a jazz drummer.

filmography.title: The King and Four Queens
filmography.role_description: One of four widows of outlaw brothers who charms a smooth-talking stranger (Clark Gable) into helping her find hidden gold.
filmography.plot: A con man charms four widows of outlaw brothers to find the gold their husbands stole.

filmography.title: Lizzie
filmography.role_description: A tour-de-force role playing a woman with three distinct personalities, released the same year as 'The Three Faces of Eve'.
filmography.plot: A woman suffering from multiple personality disorder struggles to integrate her disparate selves.

filmography.title: A Hole in the Head
filmography.role_description: A widow and fashion shop owner who becomes the romantic interest of a charming but irresponsible hotel owner.
filmography.plot: A widower father runs a small Miami hotel and tries to keep his business afloat and raise his son.

filmography.title: Home from the Hill
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of a powerful Texan who protects her son from his father's philandering ways and dominance.
filmography.plot: The story of a wealthy Texan's complicated relationships with his wife, his son, and his illegitimate son.

filmography.title: Return to Peyton Place
filmography.role_description: A mother who deals with the fallout when her daughter writes a sensational novel about their town.
filmography.plot: The residents of a small town are thrown into turmoil when a young woman writes a tell-all book about their secrets.

filmography.title: The Sound of Music
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, sophisticated fiancée of Captain von Trapp who gracefully bows out when she realizes he loves Maria.
filmography.plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.

filmography.title: The Oscar
filmography.role_description: A talent scout who discovers an unscrupulous actor and is discarded as he climbs his way to the top.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous actor claws his way to the top of Hollywood, betraying everyone who helped him along the way.

filmography.title: Eye of the Cat
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, cat-loving aunt who becomes the target of a murder plot by her nephew, who has a fear of cats.
filmography.plot: A man plots to murder his wealthy, cat-obsessed aunt, but his plan is complicated by his own ailurophobia.

filmography.title: Warning Shot
filmography.role_description: A widow whose husband is killed by a police officer, triggering an investigation into the officer's conduct.
filmography.plot: A police sergeant kills a man he believes is a killer, but when the victim turns out to be a respected doctor, he must clear his name.
